articles.title: 8-point jump in Duterte's approval rating reflection of responsive governance — Palace - GMA News Online
articles.description: Malacañang on Friday welcomed the Pulse Asia survey showing a 72% performance approval rating for President Rodrigo Duterte in December, saying it demonstrates that the administration is responding to the needs of the people.

articles.title: Chanathip takes Thailand closer to winning Suzuki Cup - The Star Online

articles.title: Mercedes pulls ad amid debate over model's eyes - News24
articles.description: Mercedes-Benz removed a video advertisement from a Chinese social media website, state media said, after the clip got swept up in a charged national debate over depictions of Asian-looking features by foreign companies.
